path = '/sys/class/gpio/test'
fs.CreateFile(path)
os.chmod(path, 292)
start_time = time.time()
threading.Timer(test_input, lambda : os.chmod(path, 438)).start()
await_permissions(path)
assert (time.time() - start_time < WAIT_PERMISSION_TIMEOUT) == expected
pytest.mark.parametrize('test_input,expected', [(0.1, True), (1.5, False)])
